text.text:
Poster/demo/sponsor session starts in 5 mins in the <https://live.remo.co/e/galaxy-poster-session|Poster-Demo-Sponsor Hall (PDSH)>. Time to beam over to planet Ghent!

Places to visit:
1. F1000Research has a sponsor table on the ground/first floor of the PDSH. Drop by and learn more about how F1000 supports researchers, and about the <https://f1000research.com/gateways/galaxy|F1000Research Galaxy Gateway>.
2. The Career Center Table is also on the first/ground floor. Drop by if you have an open position (and add it to the table's whiteboard), or check out what open positions people have posted so far.
3, Posters and demos! Wednesday poster/demos are on the *3rd and 4th floor*, and their IDs start with "We". You will need to take the elevator on the left to get to these floors.

We will meet back in the <https://live.remo.co/e/galaxy-main-event|Main Event building> in an hour and 45 minutes.  Until then we will see you in the PDSH.
